description:
A true light-hiker or souped-up approach shoe, the Mescalito TRK GTX handles serious mountain missions. The 1.8mm suede has a waterproof-breathable membrane and a tough rand for abrasion protection. The stout rubber sole grips when your approach demands some climbing moves.

  • Durable suede upper has a stretch fabric collar for a comfortable fit
  • GORE-TEX® waterproof-breathable membrane keeps your feet dry in unfavourable weather
  • Polyurethane full rand protects suede from abrasion and adds grip in climbing terrain
  • To-the-toe lacing allows a customized fit
  • Ortholite footbed cushions underfoot
  • 2D polyurethane midsole has an anti-torsion TPU shank for stability
  • Vibram® Dynamis Trk outsole provides traction in loose terrain
name: Scarpa Mescalito Trk Gore-Tex Backpacking Boots - Men's
